Summary: Reflecting alot of light, gold-ish , shooting star like
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Fort Hood
There were no other sightings in Fort Hood on or around October 9th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsMy daughter was at a football game yesteday the day after she went to the volleyball game and saw the same thing in the same place around the exact same time. But except for there being 4 this time there were 7. She wondered if they would be there a second time the next day and looked in that direction and noticed it again. Some were flying over and under each other VERY CLOSE. Alot of her friends noticed after she had pointed it out. She wasnt the only one who had seen these ufos. P.s on the 8th on the way home.. we saw another ufo on the way home towards 190. And we all looked from inside the car and then it disappared.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
